title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person is one of the most frequent dreams, especially by his relatives. Perhaps the reason for repeatedly dreaming about the dead person is the intense grief that falls on the parents due to his loss, and it may be due to thinking about him frequently and seeing the dead in a dream. Many interpretations and many indicators. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person is one of the dreams that indicate goodness in general. If one sees that the dead person gives him something, this is a sign of the coming good sustenance and abundance that the dreamer will receive if the dreamer refuses to accept the gift or present from the dead. The vision indicates the dreamer’s bad behavior and lack of intelligence. If one sees the deceased doing some good deeds in a dream, and the deceased is happy and looks at the dreamer, then this is a sign to the dreamer of the necessity of doing good and constantly repelling evil and suspicion. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about Mitiri. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person in a dream is that he dies again and his family is crying for him and they feel very sad about his separation, but he is not crying is evidence that his family will follow them with joy and vitality. It is approaching the release of anxiety and restlessness, and that stability and calm will be the dominant feature in their home. If a person sees a dead person in a dream as if he came to take something that belongs to him and leaves without speaking, this means that a loved one close to his heart will die soon, but if he sees a dead person He died again, but without seeing his appearance, and he did not perform a funeral and did not cry, and if someone was inside it, this indicates that the dreamer’s house will be demolished and demolished, or that he is an irresponsible person, so he must be more precise and aware in making his decisions. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for one person: An unmarried woman seeing a dead man giving her something is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and a lot of goodness that will come to her soon, and perhaps this provision is something expected to happen or something as long as she prays to God Almighty to grant it. An indication of the satisfaction of her desires, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a dead person whom she recognizes while talking to her or with others and she is in a state of astonishment and astonishment, then this is a sign of the approaching date of her wedding, but if she sees that a dead person is eating with her in a dream, the vision shows her superiority in Her life in general. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man for a married woman indicates achieving goodness, happiness, and pleasure for her in her next life, especially if the feeling that overcomes her in the dream is fear, anxiety, or discomfort in general. Her pregnancy is approaching and the house will be filled with joy and happiness due to the news of the pregnancy. If a married woman sees that she is talking to a dead woman in her dream, and the conversation between them is good and continuous without conflict or screaming, then this is evidence that her future life will be wiser and that what she has suffered will be resolved. In which. Life will not repeat itself again, and perhaps the reason is the intelligence and correctness of her opinion. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman dead in her dream predicts that she will overcome the difficulties, pains and tragedies she is experiencing, especially if she is going through a difficult and not good period of pregnancy, and the vision shows a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair cut in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cut hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of seeing cut hair in a dream indicates many different meanings, and seeing cut hair in a dream indicates the loss of anxiety and distress and paying off debts, and this indicates good news, peace, happy surprises, and positive changes in life. The fortune teller, and if a girl sees that her fiancé suddenly cuts her hair, this can explain this person’s misbehavior and she must stay away from him. Seeing a haircut by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained seeing hair cut in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting long hair in a dream is evidence of a rapid loss of power, prestige, and power. Seeing hair in a dream generally means that debts will be paid soon. Interpretation of seeing cut hair in a dream is evidence of the cessation of pain, tension, and sadness. Beautiful hair in a dream is an indication of an improvement in one’s condition. The dreamer. The interpretation of a haircut in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has a prominent and distinguished position. The interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream indicates a major change in one’s life, whether in the commercial or emotional fields. The interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream for a religious person is Evidence that the Hajj will take place soon. Seeing Nabulsi’s haircut. Al-Nabulsi mentioned the interpretation of seeing hair cut in a dream, which may indicate the dreamer’s desire to make changes in his life. The interpretation of seeing a long haircut in a dream may indicate an important decision in the dreamer’s life. It indicates The interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream indicates that there are things that the dreamer will be disappointed with. Plucking hair in a dream is a sign of financial problems. The interpretation of seeing long hair cut in a dream indicates paying off the debts of the debtor. Seeing hair growing in different places in the dream indicates Sadness and anxiety for the dreamer. Seeing Ibn Shaheen’s hair. Interpretation of shaving during Hajj is evidence of this person’s guidance, righteousness, and justice. Interpretation of a dream of cutting and burning hair in a dream is evidence of the existence of a major problem. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream is a sign that God will forgive this person’s sins and transgressions. Interpretation Dreaming of cutting and dyeing hair in a dream is a sign of a desire for change. Seeing an individual’s haircutInterpretation of a dream of cutting a girl’s hair in a dream means bearing many unbearable burdens and responsibilities. Interpretation of seeing hair cut and dyed in a dream is evidence of willpower, the pursuit of dreams, and a better life.Interpretation Seeing hair cut in a dream is evidence of solving the problem and a major crisis that the girl is going through, but it will end. A dream about a haircut: A girl cutting her hair to change her hairstyle. It symbolizes good and dangerous changes. Interpretation of seeing a long haircut in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the desire for freedom The interpretation of a dream about a young woman getting her hair cut by a stranger who cuts her hair while she is not satisfied is evidence that she is restricted by others. Seeing a haircut in a dream Hair scissors can be beneficial or bad. For an unmarried girl, seeing a haircut indicates anxiety and fear. If the hair is beautiful, symmetrical and cut, this is a bad omen and a sign of hearing news

title: Interpretation of seeing friends in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing friends in a dream or dreams through the website Vision roy2a.com. Friends are those who are connected by a strong and distinct bond not by blood, but by some choice of their own. Seeing friends in a dream has many different meanings. Interpreters differed in interpreting seeing friends in a dream according to the condition of that friend in the dream and according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances and whether he is a single man or a female. , married or pregnant today, through the Roya website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing friends in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing friends in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing friends in a dream refers to The dreamer's desire to reveal and talk to someone about what is hidden inside him. Seeing friends laughing in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels comfortable and happy and is in a good psychological state. Seeing old friends in a dream indicates the ability of insight to overcome the problems and sorrows he is exposed to. Seeing a close friend In a dream, it indicates good news that will soon reach God. Seeing a sick friend in a dream The viewer appears to feel tired and stressed during this time. Seeing childhood friends in a dream It indicates the dreamer’s lack of memories of the past and his nostalgia for those days. Seeing friends quarreling in a dream It indicates benefit Which they actually collect. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dining table in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing friends in Al-Nabulsi’s dream: Seeing a happy friend in a dream states that the fortuneteller will receive good and promising news about this friend. Seeing farewell friends in a dream indicates the emergence of distance and separation between them due to disagreements or Traveling or any other reason. Seeing friends hugging in a dream indicates the relationship of love and friendship that brings them together and the strong and close ties between them. Seeing old friends in a dream indicates the collapse of problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a sick friend in a dream indicates that this friend is actually suffering because of An experience or because of an illness, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream. Interpretation of seeing friends in a dream for a man: Seeing a handsome friend in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller will be able to achieve the goals he seeks. Seeing a man as a bad friend in a dream. It indicates news. Sad that the dreamer will hear it soon. Seeing a man losing his friend in a dream shows that something bad will happen to the pioneer. Seeing betrayal and betrayal of a friend in a dream indicates the state of turmoil and anxiety that the viewer was experiencing at that time. What is the interpretation of seeing friends in a dream for a single woman: Seeing friends alone who seem to be in a state of turmoil and anxiety that the viewer was experiencing at that time. A good condition in a dream shows that he will receive good news in the near future. Seeing friends alone looking ugly in a dream shows that she is sad as a result of sad news that she will hear or because of a failure in emotional connection. Seeing old friends alone in a dream shows the happiness that will come

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a shirt

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a shirt in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about cutting a shirt in a dream and we found that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, tell us. Get to know the interpretations of the scholars working for this dream and the reader should know that the site managers do not provide interpretations, rather they are Interpretations from the heart by some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a shirt in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is crying over a tight shirt, may indicate that he will be freed from serious worries and sorrows in his life, thanks to God. If you see yourself cutting a shirt in a dream, this may indicate that you will get rid of disappointment and betrayal. If a person sees that he has cut off his shirt, this may indicate the end of the financial crises that the dreamer was facing in the life of the past period. If one sees that he has cut off a shirt in a dream, this may indicate the stability and happy life that one is living at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about cutting meat at a butcher in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is cutting meat in a butcher shop indicates the great effort exerted by the person who has this vision. The days in which he cuts meat in a dream may indicate that some of the health problems that he has recently been exposed to have been overcome. The latter, in the event that one believes that he is cutting forbidden meat, may indicate his action after vices and superstitions. Whoever cuts meat in a dream may indicate that he is traveling or searching for food and reaching it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream If you see yourself cutting hair Undesirable in a dream, it may mean that you will get rid of the dreamer’s problems and fears. A dream about cutting hair may indicate that the visionary will experience some financial crises. Anyone who dreams of cutting his hair may indicate an accumulation of debts or a problem at work that he may face. In the event that he sees A person cutting one’s hair in a dream may be an indication of the end of worries and sorrows from the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting raw chicken in a dream: Anyone who dreams of slaughtering a chicken can indicate getting rid of the bad events that the dreamer was facing in his life during that time. Time. A dream of cutting a chicken in a dream may indicate that circumstances will change for the better, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of cutting a chicken may indicate getting rid of sins and sins that the dreamer has committed in the recent period. If one sees that he is cutting a chicken in a dream, this may indicate repentance Sincere to God, the Blessed and Most High, by the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about pieces of blood coming out of the mouth in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that a piece of blood coming out of his mouth can indicate a difficult time that the dreamer is going through at that time and needs to ask God for help. If a person sees pieces of blood coming out of his mouth, this may indicate the experiences and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. A person’s dream of blood coming out of his mouth may indicate the family instability he was dealing with at that time. In the event that Seeing a piece of blood coming out of his mouth, this may indicate the crises he is suffering

preview.html: Dream of a Wedding: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream shows God’s care. It also indicates families, religion, and many worries and sorrows. This vision is one of the types of visions and dreams that indicate many different meanings, which can sometimes indicate good or bad for the dreamer, depending on the situation of the dreamer. The seer and the seer. The basic details of the vision, in this article we explain these interpretations according to what is stated in the various interpretation books. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about marriageInterpretation of dreams about marriageRead also: Washing the deadWe also explain in the following interpretation Ibn Sirin’s vision of marriage in a dream, which is as follows: Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying an old man, this portends many good things. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a wedding in a dream is a vision worthy of praise. It indicates the changes that occur in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer sees himself marrying another woman while he is married, This indicates that his wife is pregnant. Likewise, if the dreamer is going through a difficult financial crisis and sees in his dream that he is getting married, this indicates an improvement in financial circumstances. Read more: Interpretation of seeing wearing a skirt and a pocket in a dream Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married woman There are also some interpretations that indicate Many interpreters have used it to interpret dreams about marriage for a married woman, and this is what we learn as follows: If a married woman dreams that she is getting married and in reality she gives birth to a son. This indicates that her son is approaching marriage, and God knows best. Seeing a wedding in a dream with a dead person indicates Poverty and hardships that the dreamer may face in life. If a married woman sees that she has married again, she will become pregnant again. If a married woman sees that she is marrying someone other than her husband, she knows him. This indicates the goodness that will come to her from this man. If a married woman sees that she is marrying someone other than her husband, she knows him. This indicates the goodness that will come to her from this man. Other than her husband, she does not know him. This indicates that she may undergo some changes in her life. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a man. As we mentioned previously, the interpretation of dreams about marriage has many different meanings, so we explain below the interpretation of this dream if the fortuneteller is a man and they are as follows: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is marrying his wife to a woman he knows. This indicates that he will obtain a promotion or high positions at work. It also indicates that he must prove himself in this work and succeed. If the dreamer sees that he is marrying a woman he does not know. This indicates Indicates that he will get into trouble and may lose his job and position. In the event that the fortuneteller sees that he has married a woman with a disreputable reputation. This indicates that she may fall into forbidden things, and God knows best. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a pregnant woman. We also explain next the interpretation of dreams about marriage. Pregnant, through some of the following interpretations, which are as follows: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is marrying a man she knows. This indicates the date of birth and you must prepare for this date. If a pregnant woman sees that she is marrying a man she does not know. This indicates that her husband has the opportunity for travel

title: Interpretation of seeing an outstretched hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a hand being pulled in a dream or dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com. We encounter it in life, and seeing a handshake in a dream can indicate goodness, or it can be a warning or warning of the emergence of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a handshake, whether it is the same. The married, pregnant, and divorced woman in its various meanings. Seeing an outstretched hand in detail in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an outstretched hand in a dream? Seeing a hand being pulled in a dream is a sign of the desire of the person who shakes hands with the fortuneteller to help him In overcoming difficulties and leading him to the right path. Dreaming of a husband holding his wife’s hand in a dream is a sign of the intensity of his love for her and the strength of their relationship. Seeing a father or mother pulling their son’s hand is a sign of the strength of the family bond. An unmarried girl dreamed that a young man pulling her hand is a sign of engagement and imminent marriage. Seeing someone pulling The girl’s hand is a sign that he is in dire need of help. See also: Interpretation of seeing a watch in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream in which I hold my friend’s hand? A dream of holding a friend’s hand in a dream is a sign of the friend standing by the dreamer and supporting her. Dreaming of seeing a hand holding a friend is a sign of family and social cohesion Seeing a man holding his friend’s hand indicates the end of problems and difficulties. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream holding her friend’s hand is a symbol of the approaching date of birth. See also: Interpretation of seeing deformed hands in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about holding a hand and letting it go? If one sees in a dream that someone is holding his hand. Then he leaves it, and this is evidence that you are moving away from the fortuneteller and leaving him alone. A hand holding a dream and leaving it is a sign of the feeling of sadness and despair that prevails in the dreamer. What is the interpretation of a dream about a single woman holding the hand of a well-known man? A dream about a girl holding her fiancé’s hand is a sign of her love for her and the strength of their relationship. Seeing a single girl holding In her father’s hand is a sign of his support and sympathy for her and offering solutions to her problems. A dream about a single girl holding the hand of her lover is a sign that she is getting rid of her problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream when you hold the hand of someone you love? Seeing yourself holding the hand of someone you love in a single girl’s dream is a sign of Her connection to this particular person is close to reality. Jurists have explained that seeing yourself holding the hand of someone you love in a dream is evidence that you stand by the visionary and help him overcome crises. What is the interpretation of holding hands in a dream? Dreaming of holding a broken arm in a dream indicates the abundance of deceivers and hypocrites around The priest. The dream of holding a woman’s hand in a man’s dream is a symbol of worldly pleasures. Seeing yourself holding hands in a dream is an indication of illness or ill health. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag or bag in a dream. We are pleased to see the reception of your dreams on the site about “Interpretation of seeing an outstretched hand in a dream,” Through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pigeon droppings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pigeon droppings: There can be many different types of birds, as they can differ in shape, size, colors, and characteristics. They are distinguished from other animals by their ability to fly in the sky, but there are many species that cannot be built due to their weight but are classified as birds. Interpretation of a dream about pigeon droppings: Animal waste can be considered a very important natural fertilizer for plants, which can be used in agriculture, to produce high crops. Quality, interpretation of the dream of pigeon droppings may be as follows: - Reaching the interpretation of the imam’s waste, which is a form of sustenance and blessing for the dreamer in the dreamer’s life. It is also one of the visions that indicate the happy news that awaits the dreamer in his next life. When it is seen in the student’s dream, this indicates On his excellence and success in the later stages of his life. It should be noted that seeing feces in a dream is one of the signs of freedom that the dreamer will gain if he is imprisoned. Likewise, excrement in a dream is a sign of comfort after distress and happiness after sadness. In general, it came down to the interpretation of the excrement that comes out Of birds, as food and happiness for the viewer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about shortness of breath and suffocation in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of bird droppings on clothes for unmarried women. Many of us may notice the presence of feces on our clothes while walking in the street, and it is known that it is one of the signs of salvation that the viewer will gain, but that is the interpretation of bird droppings on the clothes of unmarried women. Clothes for unmarried women were as follows: - Many commentators interpreted bird droppings and their presence on clothes as a sign of abundant sustenance for the dreamer. It should be noted that it is a sign of engagement with an unmarried girl. It is also an indication of her superiority and success in studies. It is also one of the signs that is considered The single girl has the happiness that awaits her, and God knows best. This vision is one of the indications that the unmarried girl will end her problems and start a new life. It is one of the signs of her marriage to a person of high morals and perfection in religion. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of menstrual blood or menstrual cycle according to Ibn Sirin. The fall of the pigeon. On my head in a dream. It is known to many people that when bird droppings fall on a person, it is a good omen and that he will provide them with sustenance. It is worth noting that pigeon droppings fall on my head in one dream, which refers to these dreams: -And in the case of the droppings falling on the head of an unmarried girl This indicates the approaching date of her marriage, and God knows best. However, if it falls on the head of a married woman, it is a sign of the end of her worries and relief after distress. Also, this dream for a man is a sign of the abundance of nutrition with which he will be honored in his coming days. As stated in his interpretation for the pregnant woman, she is one of the signs of the abundance of nutrition with which he will be honored in the coming days. Signs of a safe birth. It is worth noting that Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream as good news for the dreamer, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing loud laughter in a dream from the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about bird droppings in the house. It is possible to see birds defecating in the windows or that they have entered the room.

title: Interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a maze in a dream via the website roy2a.com To see a maze or confusion in a dream, this indicates psychological pressure, anxiety, fear of the future, many problems and disagreements in the dreamer’s life, and the inability to make the right decision. Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other interpreters in the modern era. Follow us on the Roya website. Interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a maze in a dream indicates many problems and problems that he is exposed to and is unable to solve. Seeing a maze in a dream means hesitation, confusion, inability to make fateful decisions, and a lot of confusion and randomness. If one sees that he is in an unknown place and gets lost in his dream, this indicates psychological, emotional, or social disorders. Seeing the loss of a husband or children in a dream indicates love Strong for the family and a strong bond between them, and it may indicate the opposite. Read also: Interpretation of seeing ascending to the moon in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a maze in an unknown place in an unmarried woman’s dream means fear of the future and making fateful decisions. The novel The Labyrinth In a dream for a girl, it indicates that she is confused about an important topic or issue. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about climbing to the top of a mountain. What is the interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream for a married woman? The novel of a maze in a married woman’s dream indicates instability in her married life and a lack of feelings of love and attention from her husband. Seeing a lost or maze in a married woman’s dream indicates fear, doubts about something, and discomfort. If a married woman sees a lost house in a dream, this indicates many family or social problems and disagreements. Read also: Interpretation of seeing yourself climbing to a high position in a dream: What Interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing confusion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an intense fear of fatigue during childbirth and after childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees that she is moving away from the road and cannot find a home, this indicates the pregnant woman’s need for care and attention. What is the interpretation of seeing a maze in a dream? A dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a divorced woman walking on a dark road and this unknown road in the dream indicates tension, fear, and many problems and psychological pressures. Seeing confusion in a dream indicates the confusion, fear, and exhaustion that the surrounding people suffer from, and the feeling of not knowing the way indicates extreme tension and anxiety. And fear of the future. Read also: Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream that we lose our way to singles? Seeing confusion and losing our way in a single woman’s dream indicates a feeling of loneliness and fear of the future. Seeing confusion and losing our way to singles in a dream indicates instability. Emotional and their need to feel comfortable and safe. Seeing confusion in a dream indicates fear for the people around you. What is the interpretation of a dream about a maze in the house? Seeing a maze in the house in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marriage in childhood by Ibn Sirin: There is no person in life who does not dream, everyone dreams, but 50% of dreams are forgotten five minutes after waking up, and sometimes these dreams are a reason for invention and creativity, as happened with the inventor Graham, who was even well-known By recording his dreams to help him in inventing, and in this article we try to present the interpretation of the dream of marriage at an early age in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of marriage at an early age in a dream by Ibn SirinThe vision of marriage at an early age in a dream can be interpreted as either an imminent marriage or a significant delay in marriage. In these points, we explain the interpretation of the dream of getting married at an early age by Ibn Sirin: If the vision is related to an unmarried girl and she sees in her dream that she is getting married at an early age, this indicates her marriage to a good man with good morals. Likewise, the vision of getting married at an early age indicates It indicates that the unmarried girl will get a promotion at work, especially if she is an employee. Sometimes this indicates the family stability that the girl will enjoy in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing water in a dream for married and single women by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age. In a dream of a young man, a person should not associate his life with dreams and not be interested in them, because in the case of great interest, especially when he hates them, the devil can show him in his sleep unwanted things and disturb his sleep, and therefore they are the pipes of the devils. In these points we explain the interpretation of the dream of getting married at the age of Early in a dream for a young man: If the dreaming young man sees that he is marrying a young girl, this indicates that he will face many crises and fears. It indicates that the young man will be exposed to a time of distress and great sadness. While seeing the marriage of a young girl that the young man knows indicates that the young man will control the residents of the house that The young man belongs to him. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing shaving the beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of a woman marrying a woman in a dream. In many studies related to dreams, it has been found that a woman’s dreams differ from a man’s dreams. Men's dreams are more violent and shorter than women's dreams. Women's dreams are long, contain many events and characters, and can be a bit strange. In these points we explain the interpretation of a dream about a woman marrying a woman in a dream: Al-Nabulsi pointed out that seeing a woman marrying a woman indicates bad and bad thoughts that a person has before sleep. It may be due to the many sins committed by the fortuneteller or by both girls. In some cases, this vision symbolizes Until the dreamer commits immorality and sins and that he must repent and return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black scorpion in a dream for single, married and pregnant women according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about my mother marrying another man in a dream. Psychological and physiological factors greatly affect the dreamer, and these negative energies appear. Hidden and deeply rooted desires in the form of dreams. Therefore, the interpretation of many visions can be unfounded. Post these points

Women's dreams are long, contain many events and characters, and can be a bit strange. In these points we explain the interpretation of a dream about a woman marrying a woman in a dream: Al-Nabulsi pointed out that seeing a woman marrying a woman indicates bad and bad thoughts that a person has before sleep. It may be due to the many sins committed by the fortuneteller or by both girls. In some cases, this vision symbolizes Until the dreamer commits immorality and sins and that he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about my mother marrying another man in a dream. Psychological and physiological factors greatly affect the dreamer, and these negative energies appear. Hidden and deeply rooted desires in the form of dreams. Therefore, the interpretation of many visions can be unfounded. Post these points
